title: Gaggenau 15" Vario 400 Series Electric Grill - VR414610
description:
Gaggenau 15" Vario 400 Series Electric Grill - VR414610

The VR 414 electric grill lets you grill food in the kitchen on a large, open griddle. Lava stones ensure consistently intense heat for perfectly grilled food, while two independently adjustable grilling zones allow simultaneous grilling, frying and warming. The two-piece cast-iron griddle and the cast-iron roaster, which can be used additionally for roasting on a smooth surface, are ideal complements to the grill.

Features:

2 zones, independently controlled
Half size cast-iron griddle included for simultaneous frying and grilling on two seperate surfaces
Open cast-iron grill, lava stones
Solid stainless steel control knob
Precision crafting of 1/8-inch stainless steel
For surface mount installation with a visible edge or for flush installation
Can be perfectly combined with other Vario 400 series products
Cooktop, lavastone container and grease drip tray are made from stainless steel.
2 independently controlled heating elements (1,500 W)
Two-part cast-iron grill.

Specifications:

Operation

Control knobs with illuminated ring, cooking zone and output level markings.
Electronic control in 12 output levels.

Safety

Safety lock.
Rating

Total rating: 3.0 kW.
Total Amps: 15 A.
Connecting cable 70" without plug (hardwire required).

Approximate Dimensions:

Height: 5"
Width: 15"
Depth: 20.5"

Approximate Weight:

Shipping: 79 lbs
